channel.title: yarn on endr.in
channel.description: Recent content in yarn on endr.in

item.title: 04 Installing Yarn
item.description: To install yarn on the server, execute the following: $ curl -sS https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | sudo apt-key add - $ echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list $ sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install yarn
